pages.text: $(li)The Iron Pickaxe is the upgrade of the Stone Pickaxe.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted placing a pair of Iron Ingots and Sticks in a Crafting Table.
$(li)This pickaxe opens the possibility of mine new blocks like Gold Ore, Redstone Ore, Diamond Ore and Emerald Ore.$(br)$(li)The Iron Pickaxe has more durability than the Stone Pickaxe.
